roleset.name: to kill violently
roleset.note: SLAY-V NOTES: Member of VNcls murder-42.1. (from slay.01-v)
SLAYING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from slaying.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Robert H. Knight 's Oct. 5 editorial-page article bemoaning violence in comedy movies ( `` Hollywood , You Slay Me '' ) is interesting , but somewhat off-base .
